ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Rocket Experiment for Neutral Upwelling 2, RENU 2, Sounding Rocket Payload
ResourceHeader.Description: The Rocket Experiment for Neutral Upwelling, RENU2, NASA Sounding Rocket Mission was launched into the Dayside Cusp Region from the Andoya Space Center at 07:34 UT on December 13, 2015.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator, M.R. Lessard
